name: The Last Rose
description:
Story:

You are defending the last living Rose from the treacherous bugs attacking your roots.

Defend your roots and live to see another day! How long will you survive?!?

How to Play:

Left Click (LMB):  to shoot Thorns

Numbers 1 - 2 - 3 - 4 -5: Switch positions between plant pots

This was made for our Global GameJam 2023

Theme: Roots
